sections.heading: Power
sections.text:
This repo contains the development branch of MLPerf™ power measurement code. Everything is Apache 2.0 code developed by MLCommons™. Access is available to anyone.
MLPerf™ is using [SPEC PTDaemon] tool for measuring power. Please see
this
README for more details on how to use it.
This tutorial
demonstrates how to do a power measurement setup and do MLPerf™ Inference benchmarking with power measurements using
MLCommons CK2/CM framework
.

metadata.description: Dev repo for power measurement for the MLPerf™ benchmarks
